description:
Perl has powered startups for over 20 years. What can we learn from this rich history of dot bombs and dot coms?

This talk describes a start up process that I use to help ideas grow into new businesses. The audience will be asked to fill out a 'lean canvas' - one of the first steps in the process.

The talk includes a peek into the incubator - four startups at different stages of early growth.

The startups are powered by a lean start up engine written in Perl 5 and Perl 6. 

Find out how the APIs within the engine help learning, earning and serving.

title: Starting up with Perl 6
